body:
If you can't read chinese:
This is the kind of ntr that i can live with. Never have i read smtg with ntr and cheating in it that I've felt so good about. This is the kind of ntr we need more of, guy is an absolute asshole, gets cucked by our mc and both of them love each other and end up together. Now this, this i can appreciate. 10/10, story and art are amazing.

Damn... Why didn't he draw one extra page? I wanted to see the face of that asshole exboyfriend when he realised he got cuck by the guy he looked down on. This is the type of NTR that I can live with.
